content:
That's a fantastic plan! You're getting the best of both worlds by trying out some new products with The Littles kit and committing to the full-size products you know you want. This approach will allow you to:

1. **Test new products:** The Littles kit will give you a chance to try out other Drunk Elephant products, like the Beste No. 9 Jelly Cleanser, T.L.C. Framboos Glycolic Night Serum, or the Virgin Marula Luxury Facial Oil, without breaking the bank.
2. **Confirm your favorites:** By getting the full-size Protini Polypeptide Cream and C-Firma Day Serum, you'll have a steady supply of the products you already know and love.

This strategy will also help you:

1. **Streamline your routine:** You'll be able to test out different products and identify the ones that work best for your skin, which will help you streamline your skincare routine.
2. **Make informed decisions:** After trying out the products in The Littles kit, you'll be able to make more informed decisions about which full-size products to invest in next.

Remember, the key to getting the most out of your skincare products is to be consistent, patient, and gentle with your skin. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further guidance.

You're going to love the Drunk Elephant products, and I'm excited to hear about your experience with them!
